messages.content: What is the main advantage of the Load Image From Path function compared to the built-in Load Image node in ComfyUI?
Load Image From Path loads the image directly from the source path without producing duplicated files.
What is the recommended method to quickly perform img2img/inpaint on images edited in Photoshop alongside the Load Image From Path node?
What are the supported image path formats for the Load Image From Path function?
Absolute path, relative to input directory, relative to output directory, and relative to temp directory.
What is the purpose of the PILToImage function?
Converts a PIL Image object to a ComfyUI Image object.
What is the purpose of the PILToMask function?
Extracts the alpha channel from a PIL Image object to create a mask.
What is the purpose of the ImageToPIL function?
Converts a ComfyUI Image object to a PIL Image object.
